products.title: Chuckit! Ultra Rubber Ball Tough Dog Toy
products.summary: These ultra bouncy balls will practically fly when they're thrown! They will be sure to give your dog plenty of exercise!
products.rev1: This dog product absolutely changed my dog's life! My dog lost two pounds during the first week we played fetch with these balls!
products.rev2: My dog loved playing fetch with these balls but they were kind of easy to lose since they bounce so much.

products.title: Greenies Regular Dental Dog Treats, 36 count
products.summary: Greenies Dental Treats are healthy treats that will give your dog a fresh breath and pearly-white teeth. These treats are designed to be extrememly chewy, which helps them clean hard-to-reach places and make them satifying for dogs to chew!
products.rev1: My dog's vet recommended these treats to me after she said that my dog was developing a lot of plaque near his gums. I'm glad to say that my dog's dental hygeine has improved tremendously after eating these treats!
products.rev2: Would definitely recommend to any dog owner!

products.title: Iams ProActive Health Adult MiniChunks Dry Dog Food
products.summary: Packed with protein, fiber, prebiotics, and antioxidants! Iams Adult MiniChunks are made with 100% real chicken and come in bite-sized pieces
products.rev1: My two dogs loved Iams Dog Food even though they're usually picky eaters.
products.rev2: Ruffles cleans his plate every time!

products.title: Seresto Flea & Tick Collar for Dogs, over 18 lbs
products.summary: This flea and tick collar will be sure to keep pests away from your dog and keep your home infestation-free! The Seresto Flea & Tick Collar uses the two chemicals imidacloprid and flumethrin to prevent infestations and kill pests.
products.rev1: I was starting to find fleas inside my house during the summer and I realized my dog was bringing them in. I got him this collar and my house is now flea-free!
products.rev2: The collar doesn't have any smell and my dog seems to have no problem wearing it.

products.title: Frisco Pillow Cat & Dog Bed
products.summary: The Frisco Pillow Cat & Dog Bed is filled with comfortable polyester fiber stuffing to give your dog a wonderful sleep! It comes in different sizes to fit your dog's naptime needs. It features a machine-washable design and a removable cover that makes it super simple to clean.
products.rev2: This bed was big enough for my German Shephard. Would definitely recommend to other owners of large dogs!

products.title: KONG Extreme Thermal Insulated Dog Parka
products.summary: This stylish coat will keep your dog warm during any cold morning walk. It even features a hood to keep your dog's head and ears warm. The KONG Extreme Thermal Insulated Dog Parka has large cutouts to ensure that your dog still has complete freedom in movement. It comes in a variety of sizes and colors so we are sure that it will suit your dog perfectly!
products.rev1: Keeps my dog nice and cozy during our night jogs.
products.rev2: Got this for my pupper on Christmas and she loves it!

products.title: Mobile Dog Gear Week Away Tote Pet Travel Bag
products.summary: This travel pack can hold everything that your dog will need on a trip. It is small enough to be carried on to an airplane and it has a removable shoulder strap for easy transportation. Additionally, a placemat, two silicone bowls, and two carriers are included with this travel pack so that you can store your dog's favorite treats or food!
products.rev1: Great for carrying all my dog supplies to the dog park.
products.rev2: Very durable pack. I dropped this travel pack while hiking and it was practically unscathed after I retrieved it.

products.title: Frisco Plush Squeaking Cow Dog Toy
products.summary: Sporting an absolutely cute design, your dog is guaranteed to love this toy. It features a built-in speaker that makes wonderful squeaks that your dog will love. This Plush Cow Toy is also fluffy and cuddly, which makes it perfect for accompanying your dog to bed!
products.rev1: Ella's new favorite toy! She takes it with her to bed and it's adorable!
